    • Field Detail

      • ATTR_OPTIONS

        public static final String ATTR_OPTIONS
        the 'options' are used to build the options list
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ATTR_DEFAULT

        public static final String ATTR_DEFAULT
        a 'default' option value triggers a property deletion if that default value is selected
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ATTR_SEPARATORS

        public static final String ATTR_SEPARATORS
        the separators are useful if the default separators (',' and ':'; separators=", :") of a string based options list are not useful to split the options attribute string (e.g. if the default separators are necessary for the values or labels of the options); the 'separators' attribute is splitted by a ' ' to separate the list separator (default ',') from the key separator (default ':')
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • filterWidgetAttribute

        public String filterWidgetAttribute​(@Nonnull
                                    String attributeKey,
                                    Object attributeValue)
        Description copied from interface: WidgetModel
        the extension hook for the model implementation to consume dynamic tag attributes
        Specified by:
        filterWidgetAttribute in interface WidgetModel
        Returns:
        the attribute key for the widget tag (or the tag template) to use the attribute value; return 'null' is the tag should not use the attribute (used by the model only)
